title: Episodes 645-647: Destruction Cannon Blasts! Lucy in Trouble!, The Legendary Pirate! Don Chinjao! and Light and Darkness! The Shadow Behind Dressrosa!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A blog review covering episodes 645-647, discussing the revelation of Dressrosa's dark secret about the toys. The reviewer notes 'There is something rotten in the state of Dressrosa' and comments on Doflamingo's 'seriously shady shenanigans' involving turning humans into toys.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the Dressrosa arc revelation about toys

title: STRAWHATS GET A MAKEOVER - One Piece Episode 647 + 648 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Various Reactors
description: A reaction and review video covering One Piece episodes 647 and 648, discussing the Straw Hats' activities and the revelations in Dressrosa.

title: One Piece Travel Logs: Dressrosa Saga
author: Mechanical Anime Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the Dressrosa Saga, covering the entire arc including the revelation about the toys and Doflamingo's tyranny over the island.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Dressrosa arc

title: Thursday Rants- One Piece: The Toy People in Dressrosa
author: The Good Kind of Reviews
description: An early analysis piece discussing the mysterious toy people in Dressrosa from the manga perspective, predating the anime adaptation of this revelation.
